author: dhague
msg: Version numbers of major dependencies (e.g. Lift) are now parameters at the top of pom.xml.  Compass & Lucene updated to newer versions. Compass config file can now be set via properties file & added sample config files for file, jdbc & jndi-jdbc persistence of index.
